The violent crime rate fell nearly 16: from 2008 to 2016, during Biden's vice presidency.
An analysis found that in some cities: the total number of murders went up at least 26% in 2020 compared to the same timeframe in 2019.
Biden: s claim of a 15% decrease in violent crime is supported by the change in the rate of violent crime, although the decline in the total number of crimes was less than 15%.
